result.eng: Does everybody here speak Irish?

result.html: An bhfuil Gaeilge ag gach duine anseoDoes everybody here speak Irish?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil Gaeilge ag gaċ duine anseoDoes everybody here speak Irish?

result.eng: Do not talk to the other person.
result.ga: Ná labhair leis an duine eile
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an duine eile
result.html: Ná labhair leis an duine eileDo not talk to the other person.
result.ponchtml: Ná laḃair leis an duine eileDo not talk to the other person.

result.eng: Am I the last person?

result.html: An mise an duine deireanachAm I the last person?
result.ponchtml: An mise an duine deireanaċAm I the last person?

result.eng: He was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.
result.ga: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan dua

result.eng: This is the person to whom the money was given.
result.ga: Seo an duine ar tugadh an t-airgead dó

result.ponchtml: Seo an duine ar tugaḋ an t-airgead dóThis is the person to whom the money was given.

result.eng: There were more than twenty people there.
result.ga: Bhí breis is fiche duine ann

result.html: Bhí breis is fiche duine annThere were more than twenty people there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí breis is fiċe duine annThere were more than twenty people there.

result.eng: We expected three but only one person came.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine
result.orig: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine

result.eng: There were more than twenty people there.
result.ga: Bhí níos mó ná fiche duine ann

result.orig: Cad is ainm don duine sin

result.ponchtml: Cad is ainm don duine sinWhat is that person's name?

result.html: Chuir mé ceist ar an duine sinI asked that person a question.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir mé ceist ar an duine sinI asked that person a question.

result.eng: Whoever did it, he will pay for it.

result.eng: He is a very nice person.
result.ga: Duine an-deas is ea é

result.eng: One of those girls.

result.eng: Every one of us.
result.ga: Gach duine againn
result.orig: Gach duine againn

result.ponchtml: Gaċ duine againnEvery one of us.

result.eng: Take my advice and beware of this man!

result.orig: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seo

result.eng: Thanks to everybody who came.

result.eng: He is a reasonable person.
result.ga: Is duine ciallmhar é
result.orig: Is duine ciallmhar é

result.eng: He's a smart person.

result.eng: He's a wild one.

result.ponchtml: Is duine fiáin éHe's a wild one.

result.eng: He's a free spirit.

result.ponchtml: Is duine saoraigeanta éHe's a free spirit.

result.eng: He is the richest person on the face of the earth.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana

result.eng: I am the only person here.
result.ga: Is mise an t-aon duine anseo

result.ponchtml: Is mise an t-aon duine anseoI am the only person here.

result.eng: I am one of them.
result.ga: Is mise duine acu
result.orig: Is mise duine acu
result.html: Is mise duine acuI am one of them.

result.eng: No such person exists.
result.ga: Ní ann don duine sin

result.eng: There is nobody here.

result.html: Níl duine ar bith anseoThere is nobody here.
result.ponchtml: Níl duine ar biṫ anseoThere is nobody here.

result.eng: Nobody came.
result.ga: Níor tháinig duine ar bith

result.html: Níor tháinig duine ar bithNobody came.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫáinig duine ar biṫNobody came.

result.eng: I'd marry anybody!
result.ga: Phósfainn duine ar bith
result.orig: Phósfainn duine ar bith
result.html: Phósfainn duine ar bithI'd marry anybody!
result.ponchtml: Ṗósfainn duine ar biṫI'd marry anybody!

result.eng: The news spread from person to person.
result.ga: Scaip an scéal ó dhuine go duine

result.ponchtml: Scaip an scéal ó ḋuine go duineThe news spread from person to person.

result.eng: This one of the people who didn't pay the fee.
result.ga: Seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táille
result.orig: Seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táille
result.html: Seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táilleThis one of the people who didn't pay the fee.
result.ponchtml: Seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táilleThis one of the people who didn't pay the fee.

result.eng: That's the same person.
result.ga: Sin é an duine céanna
result.orig: Sin é an duine céanna
result.html: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.

result.eng: Somebody gave it to me.
result.ga: Thug duine éigin dom é
result.orig: Thug duine éigin dom é
result.html: Thug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.

result.eng: Somebody is here.
result.ga: Tá duine éigin anseo
result.orig: Tá duine éigin anseo
result.html: Tá duine éigin anseoSomebody is here.
result.ponchtml: Tá duine éigin anseoSomebody is here.

result.eng: There is a person from America in my class.
result.ga: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rang
result.orig: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rang
result.html: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rangThere is a person from America in my class.
result.ponchtml: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rangThere is a person from America in my class.

result.eng: I am living with someone.
result.ga: Tá mé in aontíos le duine eicínt
result.orig: Tá mé in aontíos le duine eicínt
result.html: Tá mé in aontíos le duine eicíntI am living with someone.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé in aontíos le duine eicíntI am living with someone.

result.eng: How may of you were there?
result.ga: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí ann
result.orig: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí ann
result.html: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí annHow may of you were there?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad duine agaiḃ a ḃí annHow may of you were there?

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ga: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.orig: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas

result.ponchtml: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic ṪeasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.

result.eng: Which of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó SiobhánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sine tusa nó SioḃánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?

result.eng: Julian is the oldest in the family.
result.ga: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlann
result.orig: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlann
result.html: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlannJulian is the oldest in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa ċlannJulian is the oldest in the family.

result.eng: Eithne is the youngest in the family.
result.ga: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlann
result.orig: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlann
result.html: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlannEithne is the youngest in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is í Eiṫne an duine is óige sa ċlannEithne is the youngest in the family.

result.eng: I am the second youngest.
result.ga: Is mise an dara duine is óige
result.orig: Is mise an dara duine is óige
result.html: Is mise an dara duine is óigeI am the second youngest.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an dara duine is óigeI am the second youngest.

result.eng: I am the third oldest.
result.ga: Is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.orig: Is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.html: Is mise an tríú duine is sineI am the third oldest.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an tríú duine is sineI am the third oldest.

result.eng: And are you the oldest?
result.ga: Agus an tusa an duine is sine
result.orig: Agus an tusa an duine is sine
result.html: Agus an tusa an duine is sineAnd are you the oldest?
result.ponchtml: Agus an tusa an duine is sineAnd are you the oldest?

result.eng: Which one of you is older?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sineWhich one of you is older?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sineWhich one of you is older?

result.eng: I have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ga: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.orig: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.html: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ponchtml: Tá ceaṫrar dearṫáir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.

result.eng: I'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.
result.ga: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois
result.orig: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois
result.html: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anoisI'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé pósta aċ tá mé ag siúl amaċ le duine éigin le trí bliana anoisI'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.

result.eng: I'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.
result.ga: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlann
result.orig: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlann
result.html: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlannI'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an duine is sine sa ċlannI'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.

result.eng: One hundred euro per person per week.
result.ga: Céad euro an duine sa tseachtain
result.orig: Céad euro an duine sa tseachtain
result.html: Céad euro an duine sa tseachtainOne hundred euro per person per week.
result.ponchtml: Céad euro an duine sa tseaċtainOne hundred euro per person per week.

result.eng: Two hundred euro per person per week.
result.ga: Dhá chéad euro an duine sa tseachtain
result.orig: Dhá chéad euro an duine sa tseachtain
result.html: Dhá chéad euro an duine sa tseachtainTwo hundred euro per person per week.
result.ponchtml: Ḋá ċéad euro an duine sa tseaċtainTwo hundred euro per person per week.

result.eng: It was a miracle that nobody was injured.
result.ga: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duine
result.orig: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duine
result.html: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duineIt was a miracle that nobody was injured.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁíorúilt é nár goineaḋ aon duineIt was a miracle that nobody was injured.

result.eng: She was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ga: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.orig: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.html: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bochtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ponchtml: Goineaḋ go croí í ag féaċaint ar an duine boċtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.

result.eng: Nobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ga: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.orig: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.html: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga ḃí dreaċ sollúnta orṫuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ga: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.orig: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.html: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ponchtml: Rinne duine aṁáin drannaḋ liom agus ḃraiṫ mé ċoṁ beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: I never met a more slippery person.
result.ga: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamh
result.orig: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamh
result.html: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamhI never met a more slippery person.
result.ponchtml: Níor ḃuail mé le duine ní ba ẛleaṁaine riaṁI never met a more slippery person.

result.eng: Very few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ga: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.orig: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.html: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ponchtml: Is beag duine ar doṁan gur cuiṁin leis lá an ḋúnṁaraiṫe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.

result.eng: He found another person who had flying experience.
result.ga: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.orig: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.html: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.
result.ponchtml: D'aimsiġ sé duine eile a raiḃ taiṫí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.

result.eng: He recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ga: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.orig: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.html: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ponchtml: D'earcaiġ sé 15 duine eile naċ raiḃ mórán taiṫí acu aċ i ḃforéigean agus ċuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: Ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.html: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadhA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ponchtml: Seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.eng: Among the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ga: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal

result.ponchtml: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den ċine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.

result.eng: Be sensible and don't say such things.
result.ga: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile

result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteaċt eileBe sensible and don't say such things.

result.eng: What is it? A girl. {of newborn child}

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil

result.ponchtml: Aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile

result.eng: It's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ga: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh

result.eng: Nobody could recognize him.
result.ga: Ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
